title: Nothing to Commend Her
description: The Earl of Pensby lost his wife in a fire, one that left him scarred in more ways than one. Heâ€™s surly, brooding, and according to half the ton, a monster. Except to Agatha Trumwell, she sees so much more than his scars. But with a pitiful dowry, unfavorable looks, and a tendency to speak her mind, she has nothing to commend her, or so she believes. Can these two lonely souls find love amid the gossiping beau monde while someone plots to tear their fragile world apart?
author: Jo Barrett
